hero.title: Complete Care for Your Pet
hero.subtitle: Trusted veterinary clinic with over 15 years of experience
hero.description: Complete veterinary clinic with specialized team, modern equipment and 24-hour service. Because your pet is part of the family.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer complete veterinary care for your best friend
services.description: We offer a complete range of veterinary services with specialized professionals and state-of-the-art equipment to ensure your pet's health and well-being.

products.title: Premium Products
products.subtitle: Special selection of products for your pet's well-being
products.description: We select the best products for your pet's health, well-being and fun. Quality guaranteed and special prices.

booking.title: Book an Appointment
booking.description: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you to confirm your appointment.

form.name: Full Name
form.notice: ✨ We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm

success.title: Appointment Confirmed!
success.message: Thank you, {name}! We received your appointment and will contact you soon to confirm the details.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you and your pet
contact.description: We are here to help you and your pet. Contact us to ask questions, schedule a visit or request information.

form.title: Send a Message
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: How can we help you and your pet?

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you, {name}! We received your message and will respond as soon as possible.

social.title: Follow Us on Social Media
social.subtitle: Stay updated with tips, news and promotions!

footer.tagline: Veterinary care with love and dedication

consultation.title: Veterinary Consultations
consultation.description: Complete clinical care with specialized veterinarians. Exams, diagnostics and personalized treatments for your pet.

surgery.title: Surgeries and Procedures
surgery.description: Surgical center equipped with cutting-edge technology. We perform simple procedures to complex surgeries with total safety.

vaccines.title: Vaccines and Prevention
vaccines.description: Complete vaccination program and preventive medicine. Protect your pet against diseases with our vaccination schedule.

exams.title: Laboratory Tests
exams.description: Our own laboratory with modern equipment. Fast and accurate results for assertive diagnostics.

grooming.title: Grooming and Bathing
grooming.description: Pet grooming service with qualified professionals. High-quality products and special care for your friend.

emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency
emergency.description: 24-hour veterinary emergency care, 7 days a week. We are always ready to care for your pet.

3.description: Effective preventive treatment against external parasites

5.description: Smart toy to stimulate your pet's mind
